I was trying to add http://dejan/testSite/ and got internal error above.

Found my problem ... was entering site name in 1st line and site URL in second 
line (I should learn to read the field labels). This was causing "Red Dot" to be 
interpreted as URL, was getting MalformedURLException which was caught, but 
caused NPE downstream. The code should be checking for null bookmark being 
returned from the dialog.

Fixed. Text in the URL field is now monitored and OK is disabled when it is not 
a valid URL. 

Also name and URL fields are flipped, mnemonics and dialog title are added.
